茟字的基本解释

茟
yù
藜，一种草本植物，嫩叶可食。亦称“灰菜”。

茟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yù］
［《集韻》允律切，入術，以。］
即藜。一年生草本，嫩叶可食。
[②]［wěi］
“芛1”的古字。

茟字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　茟； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1027第37
【玉篇】古芛字。註詳四畫。　又【集韻】允律切，音聿。【博雅】藜也。　又【類篇】兵笛切，音筆。草名。【佩觿集】俗以草名之茟，爲筆札之筆，非。　又【字彙】引《法華經》註：草木花始也。音委。

茟字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
茟字的起名意思

暂无。

茟
Basic explanation of words
茟
yù
Quinoa, a herbaceous plant, the young leaves are edible. Also known as "ash dish."
茟
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yù］
["Ji Yun" allows the law to cut, enter the technique, to. ]
That is quinoa. Annual herb, edible young leaves.
[②]［wěi］
The ancient character of "芛1".
茟
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Jian Zi] 　茟; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1027 Page 37
[Jade articles] Ancient 芛 characters. Note the four paintings in detail.　 [Jiyun] Yunlu cut, sound Yu. [Bo Ya] Quinoa also.　[Classes] Soldier flute cut, tone pen. Cursive name. 【Peiyouji】The 茟 with the grass name is commonly used as a pen for writing notes, which is not.　[Vocabulary] Quoting from the "Fahua Sutra" Note: The beginning of vegetation and flowers. Music committee.
